mapper.select: SELECT id, user_name userName, team_pos_code teamPosCode, account account, pass_word passWord, phone_no phoneNo, referee referee, email email, create_time createTime, update_time updateTime, full_path fullPath, path_direction pathDirection, isleaf,delete_flag deleteFlag, referee_code refereeCode FROM (SELECT SUBSTRING(path_direction,#{length}) pathd,id, user_name,team_pos_code, account,pass_word,phone_no, referee,email,create_time, update_time, full_path,path_direction,isleaf,delete_flag,referee_code FROM consumer ) a WHERE pathd NOT LIKE '%R%'and isleaf='1' and path_direction like #{pathD} AND full_path LIKE #{refereeFullPath};

SELECT c.id, c.user_name userName, c.phone_no phoneNo, ifnull( a.floating_funds, 0 ) + ifnull( a.profits_funds, 0 ) + ifnull( a.lockrepo_funds, 0 ) totalFunds, a.floating_funds floatingFunds, a.lockrepo_funds lockrepoFunds, a.profits_funds profitsFunds, c.create_time createTime, cf.nick_name nickName, llt.lastLoginTime lastLoginTime, c.delete_flag, c.referee, rcf.nick_name refNickName, lcf.nick_name leftNickName, ricf.nick_name rightNickName FROM consumer c LEFT JOIN consumer_capital_account a ON c.id = a.consumer_id LEFT JOIN last_login_time llt ON c.id = llt.id LEFT JOIN consumer_full cf ON c.id = cf.id LEFT JOIN consumer_full rcf ON c.referee = rcf.id LEFT JOIN consumer_full lcf ON c.left_code = lcf.team_code LEFT JOIN consumer_full ricf ON c.right_code = ricf.team_code where 1=1
and phone_no like "%"#{phoneNo}"%"
AND cf.nick_name LIKE "%"#{nickName}"%"
and ifnull( a.floating_funds, 0 ) + ifnull( a.profits_funds, 0 ) + ifnull( a.lockrepo_funds, 0 ) >= #{totalCapitalMin}
and #{totalCapitalMax}>=ifnull( a.floating_funds, 0 ) + ifnull( a.profits_funds, 0 ) + ifnull( a.lockrepo_funds, 0 )
and create_time >= #{registryTimeFrom}
and #{registryTimeTo}>create_time
ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT c.id, c.user_name userName, c.phone_no phoneNo, SUM(a.floating_funds+a.lockrepo_funds+a.profits_funds) totalFunds, a.floating_funds floatingFunds, a.lockrepo_funds lockrepoFunds, a.profits_funds profitsFunds, c.create_time createTime, full_path, s.nick_name nickName FROM consumer c LEFT JOIN consumer_capital_account a ON c.id=a.consumer_id LEFT JOIN consumer_settings s ON c.id=s.consumer_id WHERE BINARY full_path LIKE #{fullPath} GROUP BY c.create_time
